channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:52 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 09:52 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 08:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 07:56 Repulse of the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 07:56 Repulse of the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 07:19 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 07:19 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 07:12 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports.
item.description: 游릭 07:12 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
